title: / 2021 FIVB Volleyball Men's U21 World Championship
description:
The 2021 FIVB Volleyball Men's U21 World Championship will be the 21st edition of the FIVB Volleyball Men's U21 World Championship, contested by the men's national teams under the age of 21 of the members of the FIVB, the sport's global governing body. The tournament will be held in Italy and Bulgaria from 23 September to 3 October 2021. For the first time, the tournament will be jointly-hosted by more than one country.
Iran is the defending champions, having won their first title in Bahrain.
Players must be born on or after 1 January 2001.
